name: Firestring
tag_list: knowledge-management, enterprise-2-0, enterprise-social-networks, social-loyalty, innovation, communication, collaboration
overview:
Firestring, the Enterprise Social Networking Company, offers ground-breaking social networking solutions for businesses. We bring knowledge workers together, regardless of time zones or geography â€“ promoting community, participation and exchange in line with business objectives.

Our clients accelerate change and innovation, increasing their business efficiency through optimised teams, ongoing collaboration and knowledge management that is the natural by-product of the work people do.

Firestring has developed an enterprise social networking suite enabling effective business conversations and knowledge management aligned to strategic objectives. Our platform utilises pattern-matching algorithms and natural language processing to serve the right content to the right people when they need it, helping to minimise information overload and inefficiencies.
